objects.text:
• 925 Sterling Silver
• Elegant Wreath Design
• Perfect Gift For Her
• Authentic With Warranty

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 64 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner showcases an elegant jewelry advertisement layout divided into four soft pastel quadrants. The top-left quadrant features the brand name (`brand_name`), product title (`product_name`), and tagline (`tagline`) in a vertical stack with refined typography. Below them, a stylish script heading (`heading`) and emotional subheading (`subheading`) enhance the premium aesthetic. The top-right quadrant displays the product image (`product_image`) — a pair of wreath-designed stud earrings. The banner is accented with decorative dots and diagonal lines. The bottom-left highlights key features (`features`), price (`price`), and a vibrant call-to-action button (`cta_button`, `cta`).

**Color Palette:**
- Light Pink: `#FDF2F5`
- Blush Pink: `#FBEAEF`
- Rose Pink: `#F8D7DF`
- Warm Peach: `#FFCCB3`
- Cream Blush: `#FFDFD3`
- Rose Accent: `#D65D8E`
- Deeper Rose: `#E76B9F`
- Contrast Brown: `#5C3039`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Shadow Pink: `#FAE0E8`
product_color: The product image showcases elegant earrings featuring a harmonious blend of soft rose gold (#F4A2A2), blush pink (#F7C6C7), and brilliant white (#FFFFFF) from the embedded stones. The rose gold forms the base metal framework, providing a warm, luxurious look, while the blush pink teardrop elements softly highlight the floral design. The sparkling white crystals are strategically placed to reflect light, creating visual contrast against the warm tones, making each gem stand out without overwhelming the design. For an advertisement banner, use a color palette that includes Rose Gold (#F4A2A2), Blush Pink (#F7C6C7), Diamond White (#FFFFFF), and Crystal Silver (#D3D3D3) to maintain elegance and cohesion.
